name: Boardwalk Beer Garden
address: Entrance on Boardwalk, 3152 Brighton 6th St Suite 3, Brooklyn, NY 11235, USA

reviews.text: The Boardwalk Beer Garden is a fantastic addition to Brighton Beach. Whether you‚Äôre stopping by for delicious food, creative cocktails, an impressive beer selection from just about everywhere, or to catch live sports in a great atmosphere, this spot delivers on all fronts. The staff and management go above and beyond to make every guest feel welcome. A true must-visit on the Brighton Beach boardwalk!
Great wrap

STRONGLY RECOMMEND.
I visited this cozy place year ago. And now, after yesterday's visit, I'm ready to give them 10 of 5, I wish, it's possible. My discovery: amazing cocktails, created with love and professionalism and  beautiful presentation, high level service .
Thank you, guys. Will be back soon.
Great job.

I recommend! me and my family looked for a place in the area that could show a football game we were wanting to see, and were so pleasantly surprised by this spot! they were nice about putting our game on, beer selection was great, food was great, and everything was so nice/clean - a great bar!!
Nice place, great staff. Love to come here for the Rangers games.
Nice atmosphere and friendly staff.

Boardwalk Beer Garden is definitely a great place to get the best drinks and eats on Brighton Beach
It‚Äôs right on the boardwalk and you get the best beach views on a summer day.
All the drinks and dishes I had were delicious ü§§
Here‚Äôs what I had from the menu :
Mojito üçπ

Pornstar Margarita
Lobster and Shrimp Tacos
(Definitely My Favorite) You Have to Get This
Juicy Luicy Burger
(Yummy and cheese filled )
Chicken shawarma
(Loved this dish )
Barbecue Wings
(Cooked to perfection)
Pretzel Bites
(Delicious)
I also love the sports bar aesthetic of boardwalkbeergarden with multiple flat screens it‚Äôs the perfect place to have a cold beer and watch your favorite game.
I would definitely recommend this restaurant

We recently ate at Boardwalk Beer Garden. The staff was attentive and exceedingly helpful. The food and drinks are delicious. For those who love seafood I would highly recommend  to try shrimp cocktail (shrimps are good quality and sauce is outstanding). Solyanka and chebureki are another highlight of the menu. Will definitely come back.
Terrible customer service and in the end they added me a double tip

Met expectations but with the surcharge. Fast friendly service. Got my single can of diet coke. Paid a penalty for using my credit card. Ambiance was boardwalk. Also a little put off by the involuntary 15% gratuity added to my diet Coke purchase

I was very impressed by a very sophisticated service!!! Allen was great! Thank you for making my day
Beautiful! Love u!

Ordered chicken tenders at the boardwalk grab and go counter, had to wait over 30 minutes for my food and remind them a couple times, when they finally gave them to me the chicken was fully uncooked, totally raw, pink and translucent in the middle. Threw them away so I wouldn‚Äôt get salmonella

I recently visited Boardwalk Beer Garden and had an overall enjoyable experience, though there‚Äôs definitely room for improvement. The food is decent‚Äînothing particularly memorable, but it gets the job done if you‚Äôre looking for something casual to go with your drink. The real highlight here is the beer selection: with about ten different options on tap, there‚Äôs enough variety to keep most beer lovers satisfied. Whether you‚Äôre into lagers, IPAs, or something more adventurous, you‚Äôll likely find something to enjoy.

The staff is friendly, upbeat, and welcoming, which really helps set a laid-back tone. However, things could be a bit more organized‚Äîorders can take a while, and there‚Äôs some confusion during busy hours. To be fair, they‚Äôre working under tough conditions with lots of loud, sometimes unruly customers, which can‚Äôt be easy.

The atmosphere is relaxed, making it a solid spot to hang out with friends or unwind after a long day, especially if you‚Äôre into a boardwalk vibe. It‚Äôs not a must-visit destination, but it‚Äôs a good, casual stop if you‚Äôre in the area and want a beer and a bite. I‚Äôd give it 4 stars mostly for the vibes and drink selection.

May, 19 . I want to share a negative experience from my visit to your bar. The behavior of the security guard was extremely unprofessional. Instead of performing his duties calmly and respectfully, he acted like he was the boss, speaking to‚Ä¶

Absolutely loved this beer garden! The food was fantastic‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and way better than your typical bar fare. The service was just as impressive‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. We were celebrating a special occasion, and they even treated us to a round of beer, which was such a thoughtful touch. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Wonderful service. Wonderful food. Wonderful establishment.
The best place in South Brooklyn. Delicious and the great service
Service was slow, borderline rude, we have waited for too long, they forgot about many orders. Food was moderately good, but quality - price ration is off.

Had a great experience at Boardwalk Beer Garden. A lot of new high quality screens to watch sporting events. They have a huge selection of draft beers. The food and ambience is spectacular with a lot of great menu options. The burger and wings are my favorite items on the menu. You can tell they use high quality ingredients and the portions are large. The staff is friendly and very attentive. Definitely will be back again!
Great local place to come for good food and a drink. Full bar with great beer selection. Friendly staff and perfect atmosphere to watch a sport event. Defiantly recommended.

I love this place! Food is delicious. Specially I can recommend shrimps! Good place inside also. Perfect for watch some game and have a beer with food. Stuff very friendly and fast. Specially waiter with blond hair. Thank you! Definitely recommend and will come back! ‚ù§Ô∏è

We were so happy to happen upon Boardwalk Beer Garden today! Great, friendly service and nice selection of beers, cocktails and food options and many screens to watch all the games. Also, the bouncer at front was so welcoming üòä thank you- We will be back!
Great place by the water. Food and service are excellent! Wish I lived closer. Love the pickled vegetables. Warm and comfortable. Will try again.
Good beer and good food. Price is ok
Welcoming staff and inviting atmosphere to sit down and enjoy a meal, beer and sports.

We recently visited a restaurant that left our feeling extremly disappointed.The service was slow and the food was very bad .We were complaining to the owner.The owner was very rude and horrible.The owner treat the people very badly.Never ever back at this restaurant.Service is absoulutly the worst.
Excellent service. Natalie is the best bartender in New York. The cuisine is varied for every taste. The products are fresh. The menu includes rare delicacies.

It wss a horrible restaurant on holiday night. Very salted food or with no salt, no taste or very spicy.Salat leaves were not fresh, two small plates with garden salad for 11(eleven ) people.Challahach was very solty, only a peace for person and size was very little. We came all a way from Queens at 8 p.m.and over table wasn't served in proper way, 1)ceazer salad with yellow colour leaves; 2) garden salad very small porshon, salted fish, smal tiny chese peaces for 11 people. We were not happy with service and each of us payed $85 (eighty five dollars), for boll shed food. We spoke with owner adout all these but he never appollogise, he was very mean, and didnt help besides these he assolted and wanted us to leave. We had a very bad experience for beeing in that horrible place,they  rooned our holliday.I would never ever reccomend to anybody go to this place.

Extremely disappointed  and disgusting!The food was so bad you can get sick of it.We spoke to the owner, came out to our table with very rude  attitude. The place  is dirty and service terrible, don't  ever go in this place. Horrible  and overpriced. Never go back .It is absolutely NOT recommended to go there.
Very nice place to grab drinks after a stroll on the beach (ft. A Halloween cocktail they made me!) ‚ù§Ô∏è
Great food!  Try the quesadillas!
This is an awesome place with great draft beer selection and, the most importantly, the best shawarma in town! Very friendly and attentive host, awesome service and great vibes.

It is new! It is delicious! It is perfect for all your party and sports watching needs.

My group of 30!! randomly crashed Boardwalk Beer Garden on a Thursday night. The venue, chefs and staff rallied magnificently, put on the Islanders game and we had a good time!

I would love a bit more beer variety, especially add a couple of sour ales and a cider or two, but the food was above all reproach (proper crispy wings!!)
Just found this place and it‚Äôs great.  Beer selection is excellent.  Perfect place to watch spots.  Multiple games on all times.

This place is new and I was invited by my friend to try it out. The food was really delicious, good service, friendly staff. There are almost no places like this in south part of Brooklyn (you can count just few): with good beer, food and atmosphere.
For the owner - many places open but with the time everything gets worse, I really hope and wish you to keep your business with high standards and delicious food as it is now! Thank you!

This new local beer bar is the perfect spot to catch a game and unwind with a drink. The service was attentive and friendly, ensuring a pleasant experience. The full bar offers a great selection of drinks, and the food was excellent, making it a fantastic place to grab a bite. Pelmeni were yummy. The vibe was on point, creating a welcoming and lively atmosphere. Highly recommended!

What a gem this place is ! The food was good , just may be a bit more pickles in the chicken burger . The variety of beer was very impressive . The service was friendly and attentive ! We will be back

An absolute treat for the taste buds! The oysters were incredibly fresh and delicious‚Äîpure perfection with every bite. ü¶™ The bar itself has a fantastic atmosphere, with great service and a vibe that makes you want to stay all night. Highly recommend for an unforgettable dining experience!
I had a great pleasure visiting your establishment, wonderful employees, top-level service, large selection of draft beer! I recommend!

This place is great! Plenty of space, screens to watch all and any sports. Great menu, order from your phone or server. Beer that comes in a chilled glass!!! Management is friendly!!
This is likely going to become the must go to local bar.
Recommend üíØ

Excellent food, great location and friendly staff with unbelievable entertainment displays. I will be watching a lot of football games and UFC events here. Guiness on tap is a nice touch, especially with the great selection of tap beers. The tomahawk was cooked perfectly and well worth it!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at "Beer Garden," and it was an exceptional experience. The food was not only incredibly delicious but also offered a wide variety to choose from. Their menu caters to a diverse range of tastes, and I was thoroughly impressed with the quality of each dish.

The selection of alcoholic beverages was outstanding. Whether you're a beer enthusiast or prefer something else, "Beer Garden" has you covered. Their beer offerings are extensive, and they also have a well-curated selection of wines and cocktails.

What truly sets this place apart is its remarkable atmosphere.

The staff were attentive and friendly, adding to the overall positive experience. I couldn't recommend "Beer Garden" enough for those seeking a combination of delectable cuisine, a wide range of drinks, and a fantastic atmosphere. This restaurant truly deserves all the praise it receives.

Wow just Wow. Brighton Beach needed a clean upscale spot for locals and young professionals to gather and have a drink after commuting home from work. Have a nice walk on the boardwalk or a swim at the beach and then come in for a refreshing beer. Simple clean efficient, very happy this place now exists!

I live in Brighton and am very happy to report this classy Eastern Euro upscale boardwalk answer to the Manhattan sports bar scene. The food absolutely blows away anything else in Brighton...sorry Tatiana! Try the fried Siberian Pilmeni, bacon-wrapped chicken popsicles with fries; roasted potatos with mushroom appetizers to start but the real heart of the menu with the Juicy Lucy burger, quesadillas, and multiple seafood and salad offerings not to mention the tomahawk steaks with mashed potato and veggies (!!) Omg Brighton Beach thanks you! They stay open until 1a every night. Beer is amazzzing all my favorites including Paulaner and Krusovice on tap!

*They have Thursday night and Monday night NFL here as well as all NHL and UFC contests....

** I had the amazing ribeye steak tonight. OMGggg! Nothing like it here

i was shocked when i walk in in this Sports Bar! the Atmosphere the Enjoyment i felt like i am in the right spotüñ§very yummy food tasty!
Owner is very Friendly and stuff very polite and Professional

This place is a GEM by the Brighton Beach Boardwalk in Brooklyn, New York. We came here with family and friends and boy what a fantastic atmosphere. It‚Äôs clear the owner invested a lot of money into the design and details. Very chill and comfortable environment. Plenty of TVs all around for all sports and current events.

As for the staff, I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve experienced better service in Brooklyn. Extremely attentive, they clean the empty places and rubbish every couple minutes from the tables, and are actually looking to do and offer anything they can to better your meal (sauces, sides, etc) . It‚Äôs the little things that staff pay attention to that makes the staff here stand out. The bartender is very much a people person, smiling and adding the necessary attention and detail to each drink.

The food is out of this world. Even the simple foods seem to taste better here again because of the little details added to the plate. The most important thing is the food is consistent. It‚Äôs not the first time we‚Äôve come but because of our experiences we know that no matter when we come the food will be consistent and we will have a good time.

The place does also have security so safety is no concern.

Highly highly recommend this place whether you‚Äôre local or just visiting Brighton Beach. This owner really cares to give you the best experience.  5 stars all around.
The best food, drinks, and atmosphere available in Brighton Beach. 10/10 recommend, I visit every time. Excellent service!
Came with my friend to see this new place, very good food ,friendly staff . Definitely coming back.Excellent place for sport watching

I recently had the pleasure of visiting [Bar Name], and it exceeded all my expectations. The ambiance is both cozy and chic, making it the perfect spot for a relaxed evening with friends or a romantic date night. The staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that every guest feels welcomed and well taken care of.

The drink menu is impressive, with a fantastic selection of craft cocktails and classic favorites. I highly recommend trying their signature [Cocktail Name], which was expertly crafted and bursting with flavor. The bar also offers a variety of local brews and fine wines, catering to all tastes.

The food offerings are a delightful surprise, with a menu that features delicious small plates and inventive dishes. The [Dish Name] was a standout, showcasing the chef's creativity and attention to detail.

Overall, [Bar Name] is a must-visit for anyone looking for a great atmosphere, top-notch drinks, and excellent food. I‚Äôm already looking forward to my next visit!
Food was amazing, I have a good time. Definitely recommend!!!!
cozy and atmospheric place, very nice waitress and delicious menu! I'll definitely come back here again
